resources.string: Enter the user ID, tap the FETCH button, and features and data associated with the user ID will be downloaded from the server. Once downloaded successfully, tapping the name on the main screen will start user authentication on the device.

Enter user information, tap the ENROLL button, and enrollment will start next. Enrollment is processed on the device. Features and data will be uploaded to the server in the background services. The user ID field is optional. The Element SDK will assign an user ID if the field is blank.
%1$s will be deleted if enrolling with a new user
